summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2369, for the improvement of 32nd Avenue North and 33rd Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, and East Mercer Street, from 32nd Avenue North to 33rd Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways, cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24677 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
